page.title: 10Great Coxwell Meal Times
page.content: In general,three meals are taken daily:- breakfast(7-9am),a main meal, "dinner" either in the middle of the day(12-2pm) or in the evening(6-8pm) & a third light meal whenever dinner is not taken.On Saturdays & Sundays meal- times vary according to the leisure activities of each family.A number of people make some of the following:- jam,bread,cakes,wine,beer and clothes. There are several public holidays during the year:- New Year's Day(1st January),Easter(variable,March or April),May Day(nearest Monday to 1st May),Spring(last Monday in May), August(last Monday in August),and Christmas(25th & 26th December) when many families try to spend some time with relations.
